description.value: Whilst the Character is in a Frenzy, whenever an enemy inflicts Critical Damage on an ally or hits a comrade within 10 metres of the Character, they can increase their Unnatural Strength and Toughness Traits by +1 until the end of the encounter. These traits cannot exceed +8 each.

specialAbilities.description: While Frenzied, when ally within 10m is hit or critically damaged, increase Unnatural S and T by +1 for encounter (max +8 each).
